verses.verse: When Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall cut off <WH3772> the nations <WH1471>, whose land <WH776> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee <WH3423>, and thou succeedest them <WH3427>, and dwellest in their cities <WH5892>, and in their houses <WH1004>;
thou shalt set apart <WH914> three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> for thee in the midst <WH8432> of thy land <WH776>, which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee to possess it <WH3423>.

Thou shalt prepare <WH3559> thee the way <WH1870>, and divide the borders <WH1366> of thy land <WH776>, which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> causeth thee to inherit <WH5157>, into three parts <WH8027>, that every manslayer <WH7523> may flee thither <WH5127>.

And this is the case <WH1697> of the manslayer <WH7523>, that shall flee <WH5127> thither and live <WH2425>: whoso killeth <WH5221> his neighbor <WH7453> unawares <WH1097>, and hated <WH8130> him not in time <WH8543> past <WH8032>;

as when a man goeth <WH935> into the forest <WH3293> with his neighbor <WH7453> to hew <WH2404> wood <WH6086>, and his hand <WH3027> fetcheth a stroke <WH5080> with the axe <WH1631> to cut down <WH3772> the tree <WH6086>, and the head <WH1270> slippeth <WH5394> from the helve <WH6086>, and lighteth <WH4672> upon his neighbor <WH7453>, so that he dieth <WH4191>; he shall flee <WH5127> unto one <WH259> of these cities <WH5892> and live <WH2425>:

lest the avenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> pursue <WH7291> the manslayer <WH310>, while <WH3588> his heart <WH3824> is hot <WH3179>, and overtake <WH5381> him <WH1870>, because the way is long <WH7235>, and smite him <WH5315> mortally <WH5221>; whereas he was not worthy <WH4941> of death <WH4194>, inasmuch as <WH3588> he hated <WH8130> him not in time <WH8543> past <WH8032>.
Wherefore I command <WH6680> thee <WH559>, saying, Thou shalt set apart <WH914> three <WH7969> cities for thee <WH5892>.

And if Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> enlarge <WH7337> thy border <WH1366>, as he hath sworn <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1>, and give <WH5414> thee all the land <WH776> which he promised <WH1696> to give <WH5414> unto thy fathers <WH1>;

if thou shalt keep <WH8104> all this commandment <WH4687> to do <WH6213> it <WH6680>, which I command thee this day <WH3117>, to love <WH157> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and to walk <WH3212> ever <WH3117> in his ways <WH1870>; then shalt thou add <WH3254> three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> more for thee <WH7969>, besides these three:

that innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818> be not shed <WH8210> in <WH7130> the midst of thy land <WH776>, which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee for an inheritance <WH5159>, and so blood be upon thee <WH1818>.

But if any man <WH376> hate <WH8130> his neighbor <WH7453>, and lie in wait <WH693> for him <WH6965>, and rise up against him <WH5221>, and smite him mortally <WH5315> so that he dieth <WH4191>, and he flee <WH5127> into one <WH259> of these <WH411> cities <WH5892>;

then the elders <WH2205> of his city <WH5892> shall send <WH7971> and fetch <WH3947> him thence <WH5414>, and deliver him into the hand <WH3027> of the avenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818>, that he may die <WH4191>.
Thine eye <WH5869> shall not pity <WH2347> him <WH1197>, but thou shalt put away the innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818> from Israel <WH3478>, that it may go well with thee <WH2895>.

Thou shalt not remove <WH5253> thy neighbor <WH7453>'s landmark <WH1366>, which they of old time <WH7223> have set <WH1379>, in thine inheritance <WH5159> which thou shalt inherit <WH5157>, in the land <WH776> that Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee to possess it <WH3423>.

One <WH259> witness <WH5707> shall not rise up <WH6965> against a man <WH376> for any iniquity <WH5771>, or for any sin <WH2403>, in any sin <WH2399> that he sinneth <WH2398>: at the mouth <WH6310> of two <WH8147> witnesses <WH5707>, or at the mouth <WH6310> of three <WH7969> witnesses <WH5707>, shall a matter <WH1697> be established <WH6965>.
If an unrighteous <WH2555> witness <WH5707> rise up <WH6965> against any man <WH376> to testify <WH6030> against him of wrong-doing <WH5627>,

then both <WH8147> the men <WH582>, between whom the controversy <WH7379> is <WH5975>, shall stand before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, before <WH6440> the priests <WH3548> and the judges <WH8199> that shall be in those days <WH3117>;

and the judges <WH8199> shall make diligent <WH3190> inquisition <WH1875>: and <WH5707>, behold, if the witness be a false <WH8267> witness <WH5707>, and have testified <WH6030> falsely <WH8267> against his brother <WH251>;
then shall ye do <WH6213> unto him <WH2161>, as he had thought to do <WH6213> unto his brother <WH251>: so shalt thou put <WH1197> away <WH1197> the evil <WH7451> from the midst of thee <WH7130>.
And those that remain <WH7604> shall hear <WH8085>, and fear <WH3372>, and shall henceforth <WH3254> commit <WH6213> no more any <WH1697> such evil <WH7451> in the midst of thee <WH7130>.

And thine eyes <WH5869> shall not pity <WH2347>; life <WH5315> shall go for life <WH5315>, eye <WH5869> for eye <WH5869>, tooth <WH8127> for tooth <WH8127>, hand <WH3027> for hand <WH3027>, foot <WH7272> for foot <WH7272>.
